title: Gatekeeper

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Each night, pick 2 players, they cannot visit each other for the rest of the game, any attempt to do so will fail.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- May act twice once per game.
- You can target a known teammate once.

desc:
Post 4738
*"To be fair, you have to have a very high IQ to play GIM. The game is extremely skill based, and without a solid grasp of advanced socials and mechanics most of the games will go over a typical player's head."*
